thread.title: AG Jeff Sessions Suggests Openness to Review of Obama DOJ’s Actions
thread.title_full: AG Jeff Sessions Suggests Openness to Review of Obama DOJ’s Actions

author: AP
title: AG Jeff Sessions Suggests Openness to Review of Obama DOJ’s Actions

organizations.name: ag jeff sessions suggests openness to review of obama doj

text: FILE - In this March 2, 2017, photo, Attorney General Jeff Sessions speaks during a news conference at the Justice Department in Washington. Everyone splits rhetorical hairs from time to time, but politicians are especially adept at trying to dance their way out of a bind with carefully crafted explanations. Sessions, who met with the Russian ambassador twice last year, maintaining that he was truthful when he told a Senate committee during his January confirmation hearing that he “did not have communications with the Russians.” He was an adviser to Donald Trump’s campaign at the time. (AP Photo/Susan Walsh)
